name: Where's My Helmet?
description: A challenging platform style game combined with aesthetic elements of the Nordic culture and doses of humor are the charming elements that make "Where's my Helmet?" a must-have title in the Steam library of all gamers.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/8.1 Processor: 2.0 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 210  (or better) DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/8.1 Processor: 2.83 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 240  (or better) DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 200 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Well, for that price, it is a very great game, worth playing, if u like this kind of game, buy it, could be better, but still good.
It's up your bung hole probably along with all the bad ideas that went into this game.
